entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
